title: Mong Deng Atit
text:
Mong Deng Atit is a South Sudanese <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who currently plays as a <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>.
International career.
He has made two senior appearances for <a href="South%20Sudan%20national%20football%20team">South Sudan</a> against Ethiopia and Kenya in the <a href="2012%20CECAFA%20Cup">2012 CECAFA Cup</a>. He received an yellow card against Kenya.
